title: Gavin Newsom calls for full reopening of California schools by fall, urges extended class time
content:
1. Gavin Newsom calls for full reopening of California schools by fall, urges extended class time  Sacramento Bee
  2. CA Senate bill changes recall rules as Newsom faces ousting  Fox News
  3. Newsom pushes reopening as many California districts resist  KCRA News
  4. New boss at Equality California + Adult film star runs for governor + Fracking fail  Sacramento Bee
  5. California governor doubles down on call to reopen schools in the fall  EdSource
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: Gavin Newsom氏、カリフォルニア州の学校を秋までに全面再開するよう呼びかけ、授業時間の延長を要請
加文-纽森呼吁加州学校秋季前全面重开，敦促延长上课时间。
加文-紐森呼籲加州學校秋季前全面重開，敦促延長上課時間。
